Eligibility: No signs of metastatic disease No pregnancy or lactation
No previous systemic treatment for breast cancer
Serum creatinine < 1.5 mg/dl or Creat Cl > 30 ml/min
The ER, PR and HER2 status is required.
- HER2+, defined by the ratio IHC 3+ or FISH > 2.0
Results: Number of patients with a complete pathological response rate observed after treatment with carboplatin q3weeks, weekly abraxane, and trastuzumab weekly in resectable, non-resectable LABC;
These numbers represent patients with an RCB score of zero (0). RCB represents the residual burden of cancer.
Adverse Events: Diarrhoea gr 2, Nausea gr 3, infection gr 3 1/37 (2.70%)
Dehydration 3, Diarrhoea 3, Vomiting 3, HGB3, Nausea 3, K 3, Dyspnoea 2 1/37 (2.70%)
